title: Flag: Heard & McDonald Islands

nouns: Emblem usually consisting of a rectangular piece of cloth of distinctive design
A flag is a piece of fabric with a distinctive design that is used as a symbol, as a signaling device, or as decoration.
A piece of cloth, often decorated with an emblem, used as a visual signal or symbol.
Piece of fabric with a distinctive design

description: The flag for  Heard & McDonald Islands, which may show as the letters HM on some platforms. This is the same flag as Australia.
apple_vendor_description: The flag of the Heard and McDonald Islands, as rendered on Apple devices, features a sophisticated design with a clean, crisp appearance. Apple's precise graphic style ensures that the emblem is sharp and detailed, showcasing the iconic elements of the flag with its characteristic blue and white stripes and the prominent representation of the Southern Cross constellation. This emoji on Apple devices is ideal for geographical references, discussions about remote territories, or simply showcasing a lesser-known national symbol.
